blockquote.p: This profile offers two options to indicate the Certified Reference Material used for the calibration (in general when the UCUM International Units are used for the results [IU]).

ul.li: The first to be used when the Certified Reference Material is represented by a coded concept
The second when the Certified Reference Material is identified with an Identifier.

blockquote.p:
Adopters are invited to give their feedback about
The most proper way to refer the Certified Reference Material, that is by using an Identifier or a CodeableConcept
If a CodeableReference should be used
If this information should be an extension of the Observation resource, or of other elements (e.g. DeviceMetric.calibration)
